humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node was negative for tumor (0/1), and there were no other lymph nodes assessed. Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the sentinel lymph node biopsy was negative for tumor (0/1). This means that there is no evidence of cancer cells in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
